pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Decade (2009, TV show)$(br2)Used by $(l:decade/riders/decade#decade)Kamen Rider Decade$(/l) to obtain Shinken Red's Rekka Daizantou
Item is currently unobtainable (in the future, a recipe will be added but you will have to install the Super Sentai Craft mod for it to work)
